casebody.data:
In the Matter of T.R.B. No. 296A03. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 6, 2004. Laura E. Crumpler, Assistant Attorney General, for State. Coe W. Ramsey, Seth Jaffe, Raleigh, for ACLU of NC Legal Found., Inc.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd day of March 2004 by Respondent to Dismiss The State's Appeal Regarding the Probation Condition Issue for Mootness:

"Motion Dismissed As Moot by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of May 2004."
